title: Audio Playback Intents to Request Live Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill
custom_steps: WHEN the user requests a gameday audio feed of a team, nickname, or locale which is live with any of the intents listed below (test all):
custom_expected:
THEN Alexa will respond with: Playing the [team] [vs. or at] the [opponent on broadcast callsign]
AND the gameday audio feed will begin playback

custom_steps_separated.content:
Listen to the (team)
i.e. Listen to the Cubs

Listen to the (team) game
i.e. Listen to the Cubs game

Play the (homeTeam) (awayTeam) game
i.e Play the Cubs Cardinals game

Play the (team) broadcast
i.e. Play the Cubs broadcast

Play the (nickname) game
i.e. Play the Cubbies game

Play the (locale) game
i.e. Play the Chicago game

title: Audio Request by Radio Station or Broadcaster not Supported
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill
custom_steps:
WHEN the user requests a gameday audio feed by radio station or broadcaster or station ID
- Play (radio station), i.e. Play WGN
- Listen to (radio station name / call letters), i.e Listen to WEEB
custom_expected:
THEN this is not supported and Alexa responds with:
The MLB Skill can play audio broadcasts for live Major League baseball games. While listening to games you can pause and resume live playback at any time. Try saying things like, "Play the Mets game.", "I want to listen to the Royals.", or "Start the Cubs stream." What would you like to do?

title: Audio Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill
custom_steps: WHEN the user requests a gameday audio feed of a team, nickname, or locale which is available
custom_expected:
THEN Alexa will respond with: Playing the [team] [vs. or at] the [opponent on broadcast callsign]
AND the gameday audio feed will begin playback

title: Continuous Audio Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND a live gameday audio feed is playing
custom_steps:
WHEN the user listens to the feed
AND does not speak any intents (no interaction)
custom_expected: THEN the gameday audio feed will continue playing w/o interruptions

title: Continuous Audio Playback during Commercial
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND a live gameday audio feed is playing
custom_steps:
WHEN the commercials starts playback
AND user does not speak any intents (no interaction)
custom_expected:
THEN the commercials will play w/o interruptions 
AND the gameday audio will continue playing after the commercial break

title: Pause Audio Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND a live gameday audio feed is playing
custom_steps: WHEN the user requests a pause intent: i.e. "Alexa, Pause"
custom_expected:
THEN the gameday feed will suspend playback. 

*This does not hold the user's place; it merely suspends playback, it doesn't technically pause it where the user was.

title: Resume Audio Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND user has verbally paused a live gameday audio feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user requests the intent to resume playing, i.e. "Alexa, Resume"
custom_expected:
THEN the gameday feed will resume playback

*Playback does not resume where the user left off, merely reopens broadcast at current position.

title: Stop / Cancel Audio Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND a gameday audio feed is playing
custom_steps: WHEN the user requests a stop intent: i.e. "Alexa, Stop" or "Alexa, Cancel"
custom_expected:
THEN the gameday feed will suspend playback
AND no voice prompt should result

title: Volume Number for Audio Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND a gameday audio feed is playing
custom_steps:
WHEN the user requests an intent for volume number: i.e. "Volume six"
(volume ranges from 0-10)
custom_expected: THEN the gameday feed volume will increase / decrease accordingly

title: Volume for Audio Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND a gameday audio feed is playing
custom_steps: WHEN the user requests a volume intent: i.e. "Louder" or "Turn it down."
custom_expected: THEN the gameday feed volume will increase / decrease accordingly

title: Mute for Audio Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND a gameday audio feed is playing
custom_steps: WHEN the user requests an intent to mute
custom_expected: THEN the gameday feed will be inaudible

title: Unmute for Audio Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND a gameday audio feed is playing
AND the user invoked Alexa to mute the audio
custom_steps: WHEN the user requests an intent to unmute
custom_expected: THEN the gameday audio feed will be audible

title: Audio Playback Fails
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user experiences a system error: i.e. 
- AudioPlayer, Playback Failed AVS Request 
- System.ExceptionEncountered AVS Request
- BAM Internal Failure
custom_expected:
THEN the Alexa will respond with:
"Sorry, there was a problem. Please try again later."

title: EDIT Resume Audio Playback Failed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND user has verbally paused a live gameday audio feed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user waits until the gameday auidio broadcast is complete
AND the user requests the intent to resume playing, i.e. "Alexa, Resume" 
*from spreadsheet*

WHEN the user experiences an audio player system error: AudioPlayer, Playback Failed AVS Request
*from https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=BAMbots&title=AVS+Voice+Interaction+Flows%3A+GDA+Skill+2016&preview=/77189701/78316618/alexa-flows-draft-160831-inplayback.png*
custom_expected:
???? https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/SDBB-135

Resumes playback live.

?????https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=BAMbots&title=AVS+Voice+Interaction+Flows%3A+GDA+Skill+2016&preview=/77189701/78316618/alexa-flows-draft-160831-inplayback.png

Retry playback

title: EDIT Audio Playback Fails_Retry Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
custom_steps:
WHEN the user experiences an audio player system error: AudioPlayer, Playback Failed AVS Request

???? AND the user states an intent to retry: i.e. "Alexa, retry playback"
custom_expected:
THEN the Alexa will respond with:
"Sorry, there was a problem. Please try again later."

title: Audio Playback to Completion
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
custom_steps: WHEN the user playbacks a team's live audio broadcast to completion
custom_expected:
THEN the Alexa responds with:
"Thanks for listening on MLB.com!"

title: Unsupported Playback Intents
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND live gameday audio feed is playing
custom_steps: WHEN the user asks Alexa for the following intents listed below (test all):
custom_expected:
THEN the Alexa responds with:
"Sorry, I can't do that with live games."

custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa

AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game

title: DO NOT TEST____Broadcasts Listed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill and requested a game
AND a user is playing a gameday audio feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user requests the intent to change the broadcast of the gameday audio feed
custom_expected: THEN Alexa will state the broadcast list response

title: DO NOT TEST____Change Broadcast
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has signed into & setup the client app, Alexa
AND user has enabled the MLB Skill
AND account is linked to MLB.com account with At Bat premium paid subscription
AND user has opened MLB Skill
AND a user is playing a gameday audio feed
AND the user requests the intent to change the broadcast of the gameday audio feed
AND Alexa will state the broadcast list response
custom_steps: WHEN the user responds with a valid selection
custom_expected:
THEN Alexa will respond with: "Playing the [team] [vs. or at] the [opponent] on [broadcast callsign]."
AND the the playback selected broadcast begins
